name: Whitsunday Crocodile Safari
description: Experience the wild side of the Whitsundays with the Whitsunday Crocodile Safari, a unique Australian nature adventure. Explore the estuaries and wetlands of the Whitsunday coastline and witness the fascinating wildlife in their natural habitat, including the iconic estuarine crocodiles. Perfect for nature enthusiasts and families, this tour offers a blend of adventure and education, with expert guides providing insights into the local flora, fauna, and history. Enjoy a relaxing day in the great outdoors with a delicious BBQ lunch and traditional bush tucker treats.
includes:
All weather day tour with expert guides and commentary
Courtesy return bus transfers from Airlie Beach and Proserpine
Traditional Billy Tea and Damper
Rain ponchos as required
Insect repellent as required
Pick-up and transfer to tour campsite in Proserpine
Cruise on Proserpine River
Lunch from the Barbecue and Salad Bar
Complimentary iced drinking water at the campsite
highlights:
Observe estuarine crocodiles in their natural habitat
Explore the unique tropical environment of the Whitsunday coastline
Discover the vegetation and wildlife in freshwater wetland habitats
Enjoy professional expert commentary from friendly local guides
Sample traditional Australian 'bush tucker' like Billy Tea and Damper
Relax at a well-equipped campsite with historical significance
menu:
**Lunch from the Barbecue:**
- Beef fillet steak
- Gluten free sausages
- Barramundi fish fillets
- Marinated chicken breast fillet
- Barbecued onions
**Lunch from the Salad Bar:**
- Noodle, potato, and mixed green salads
- Sliced tomato & cucumber
- Bread rolls and condiments
**Note:** Vegetarian & gluten-free meals must be pre-arranged at the time of booking.
ideal_for: Nature enthusiasts, families, and those interested in wildlife and the natural environment.

name: Whitsunday Crocodile Safari
description: Experience the wild side of the Whitsundays with the Whitsunday Crocodile Safari. This unique adventure takes you through the estuaries and wetlands of the Whitsunday coastline, offering an intimate encounter with Australia's native wildlife. Perfect for nature enthusiasts and families, this tour provides a rare opportunity to observe estuarine crocodiles in their natural habitat, along with a variety of birds, mammals, and marine life. Embark on a calm water cruise aboard the River Runner and explore the rich biodiversity of the Proserpine River. Enjoy expert commentary from friendly local guides as you delve into the fascinating ecosystems and history of the region.
includes:
All weather day tour with expert guides and commentary
Courtesy return bus transfers from Airlie Beach and Proserpine
Traditional Billy Tea and Damper
Rain ponchos as required
Insect repellent as required
Pick-up and transfer to tour campsite in Proserpine
Cruise on Proserpine River
BBQ lunch
Complimentary iced drinking water at the campsite
highlights:
Observe estuarine crocodiles in their natural habitat
Calm water cruise on the Proserpine River
Explore Goorganga Plains on a tractor-drawn wagon train
Discover the unique vegetation and wildlife of freshwater wetlands
Learn about traditional Australian 'bush tucker' with Billy Tea and Damper
Marvel at diverse flora and fauna in melaleuca forests and marine mangroves
menu:
**Lunch from the Barbecue:**
- Beef fillet steak
- Gluten free sausages
- Barramundi fish fillets
- Marinated chicken breast fillet
- Barbecued onions
**Lunch from the Salad Bar:**
- Noodle, potato, and mixed green salads
- Sliced tomato & cucumber
- Bread rolls and condiments
ideal_for: Nature enthusiasts, families, and anyone interested in wildlife and unique Australian habitats.
